subtitles: 16216 18878 First there was darkness.

19886 22548 Then came
the Strangers.

22889 25881 They were a race as old
as time itself.

26559 29221 They had mastered
the ultimate technology...

29562 33896 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

34567 37900 They called this ability
"tuning."
38571 40129 But they were dying.

40240 42902 Their civilization
was in decline...

43243 45575 and so they abandoned
their world...

45912 49245 seeking a cure for
their own mortality.

50250 53583 Their endless journey brought
them to a small blue world...

53920 56582 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy...
56923 59255 our world.

59592 63528 Here they thought they had finally
found what they had been searching for.

74207 77870 My name is
Dr. Daniel Paul Schreber.

78211 80873 I am just a man.
I help the Strangers...
81548 83539 conduct their experiments.
84217 87550 I have betrayed my own kind.

293559 296221 You are confused,
aren't you? Frightened.
296562 298223 That's all right. I can help you.

298564 301158 - Who is this?
- I am a doctor. You must listen to me.

301501 305733 There was an experiment.
Your memory was erased.

305838 308830 - Do you understand me?
- What the hell is going on here?

309175 311507 There are people coming
for you even as we speak.

311844 314506 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.

315181 318173 Hello?
Are you there?

360159 363822 Mr. Murdoch. The automat called.
Said you left your wallet there.

365164 368497 I suggest you retrieve it
since you only paid for 3 weeks...
368835 371167 and they was up 10 minutes ago.

372505 377169 - I've been here 3 weeks?
- It's right there in black and white.
377510 379501 Day and date.

379846 383179 We make our books like our beds,
all neat and tidy.

383516 386178 - I'll take care of it.
- See that you do.

386519 389852 Only thing that makes you a guest
is cash on the barrelhead.

407540 410202 House rules.
3 weeks is 3 weeks.

410543 413205 No days off
for good behavior.
423489 425480 Mr. Murdoch, yes...

425825 428157 - Where is he?
- He just left...
428828 431490 not 5 minutes ago.

436502 440165 When the rumba rhythms
Start to play

440506 444840 Dance with me
Make me sway

445511 449174 Like a lazy ocean
Hugs the shore

449515 454179 Hold me close
Sway me more

454854 458517 Like a flower
Bending in the breeze

459192 463856 Bend with me
Sway with ease

464197 467860 When we dance
You have a way with me

468534 473528 Stay with me
Sway with me

474540 478772 Hey, sweetie! He said he was
your husband's doctor.
478878 481472 He wanted to speak with you.

503169 505501 - Dr...
- Schreber. Please.
506172 509164 You must be Emma Murdoch.

510176 513737 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.

513846 517179 - What is this?
- A rather crude experiment...

517517 520850 - Designed to further my studies.
- I don't understand.
521187 523519 You say you're my husband's doctor...

523856 526188 - But he never mentioned you to me.
- The truth is, Mrs. Murdoch...

526859 529521 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

529862 532854 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

533199 535861 stemming from your
marital difficulties.
536202 538193 John told you what happened?

539205 541696 When was the last time
that you saw him?

541807 545140 3 weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.

545478 549141 - He was very angry at me.
- I understand how difficult...
549482 551473 this must be. But for John's sake...

551817 554149 I would like you to think
of me as your friend, Emma.

554487 557820 It appears John has suffered
a psychotic break.

558157 561149 - Complete memory loss.
- You can't be serious.

561494 564395 Oh, but I am.
He may be delusional.
564497 566488 Even violent.

567166 570499 If he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

570836 573168 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
575174 576664 for himself.

586852 591186 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

591524 595517 Mr. "j"- something... Murdoch?
J. Murdoch.

598531 602524 What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

606872 608863 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

609208 612200 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
617883 619874 Gotta get a grip on myself.

643576 646238 I told the guy
cash on the barrelhead.

646912 650245 I said, "listen,
3 weeks is 3 weeks."

650583 654246 - Where's our lucky winner?
- Upstairs, sir, room 614.
655254 656915 Another call girl.
661193 662524 Evening, Husselbeck.

662862 666195 - Inspector Bumstead.
- Your lace is untied.

676542 680444 Am I glad you're here. They say
Det. Walenski's got the heebie-jeebies.
680546 683208 Just take what they give me.

719418 720851 - Hello.
- Oh, it's you.

721520 724182 - You left your wallet here, buddy.
- When did I do that?

724523 726855 - When you was last here.
- When was that?

727193 730526 When you left your wallet.
You expect me to remember?
738204 739535 No, no, seriously.

755888 758118 - Where you headed, chief?
- Home.

758224 761887 - And where's home?
- Haven't you mugs got anything to do?

762228 764458 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.
764563 766554 There's a killer out there...

766899 770232 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
772571 774232 Get out of here.

787520 790080 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?

790189 793181 - I believe so, sir.
- Give the man an "a" for effort.
798531 800522 So, Husselbeck...

800866 803528 what kind of killer
do you think...

803869 807430 stops to save
a dying fish?

807540 810532 - You've got me, sir.
- Bumstead, what took you?

810876 813538 This killer's been running circles
around us, thanks to Walenski.

813879 818213 With all due respect, I've known Eddie
a long time. He's a good cop.

818884 822877 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was
he let drift a long time ago.

823222 825884 - Let me talk to Bumstead!
- Come on, hold it!

827893 829554 Stop!
Frank, Frank!

832231 834222 - Get his arm!
- On your feet.
834900 836891 There's no way out!
837236 839568 God, can you see?!

842842 845834 Let me go, let me go!
I'm not gonna hurt you.

846512 848844 - What was that?
- Walenski.

857189 860181 I'm being punished
for my sins, right?

860526 864189 What did I ever do to inherit this?
Where do you begin?

864530 868523 Everything detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here.
869201 871863 He's the one that should be committed.

873873 876865 Nothing like a little
healthy paranoia.
879211 881202 Inspector Bumstead.

882214 885775 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.
885885 887546 Take it to the front desk.
887887 890549 They told me to come see you.
891557 894219 His name's John Murdoch.

896228 899561 Do these names
mean anything to you?

900165 904499 Who are these women?
Why are you looking for my husband?

904837 907397 - Are you going to accuse him?
- Maybe.

907506 910498 - Murder.
- Whose murder?
913846 915837 All of them.

916181 919844 Mrs. Murdoch, I'm sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

920185 922517 I'm sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.

922855 925847 Please, if you'll just
give me half a second.
935534 937195 Have we met before?

938537 941768 If we did... I hope you're
still breathing.
941874 943865 What's your name, honey?
946879 949211 Well, that's an appropriate name.
956555 958216 I was just thinking.
964830 967162 seems kind of dangerous...

968167 971728 right now. How do you know
I'm not the killer?

971837 974829 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

975841 979174 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1039505 1043168 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1043509 1046501 - Who are you?
- We might ask the same question.

1130195 1133187 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1133532 1136433 - It is said he is able to tune.
- Impossible.

1136535 1139527 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1139872 1142363 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1142474 1145136 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1145477 1148708 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1148814 1151044 But this one was different, yes?

1151150 1154813 - What has the doctor to say about this?
- He has failed to report in.

1155154 1158055 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1158157 1160489 Mr. Quick, dead, yes.
1164163 1166825 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1167166 1169828 Mr. Book, does he know?

1170502 1173494 Should we not know,
Mr. Hand?

1173839 1176740 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1176842 1179504 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1179845 1182507 We must have this man.
1187853 1189844 My brand, I hope.
1201200 1203862 I've been so worried about you.
1206872 1208772 Are you punishing me?

1208874 1211536 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...

1211877 1214209 - I don't appreciate it.
- I don't know what you're talking about.

1217549 1221542 I found these keys in my pocket,
so I assume I live here.

1223222 1226555 - You supposed to be my wife?
- Supposed to be?

1229561 1234225 You really... don't know
who I am, do you?

1234566 1236898 Your doctor called me.
He was worried this might happen.

1238904 1244570 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1252918 1256479 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1256588 1260183 - Why was I seeing a doctor?
- I had an affair.
1261860 1264522 You were angry at me.

1266198 1269861 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1279544 1284208 How most unfortunate it is that we
were forced to seek you out here.

1285217 1289551 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1290222 1293453 - I'm sorry. I...
- Failed to report in, yes.

1293558 1296220 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1296561 1299894 You weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1300232 1302894 We found this
in his hotel room.

1303235 1306227 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1306571 1309904 I tried to imprint him, but he woke up.
He knocked the syringe.

1310575 1313567 - He has no memories, then?
- Only fragments.

1313912 1317905 The procedure, it was interrupted.
It's a matter of rounding him up.

1318917 1322512 - You have had strays before, right?
- This is no stray, doctor.

1323188 1325850 - This one can tune.
- But that's impossible.

1326191 1329183 - I thought only you had that ability.
- You will process...

1329528 1332088 another template of
the subject's memories, yes?

1332197 1334529 Of course.
I'll imprint him again.

1335200 1338533 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.
1338870 1341202 It's almost midnight, Dr. Schreber.

1341540 1343531 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning...
1344209 1346439 but no more delays, yes?

1346545 1352211 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.

1352884 1355546 - The police are looking for you.
- I know.

1355887 1359550 I saw the papers. "Killer stalks
city streetwalkers."

1362894 1365226 I was with
one of those women...

1366565 1369898 - Before I came here tonight.
- I don't understand.

1370235 1373136 I met her
outside an automat.
1373238 1376230 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1376908 1380173 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1380512 1384846 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm not a killer.
1390856 1392847 I believe you.

1400866 1403528 The car outside...
the one you arrived in.

1403869 1406861 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.

1408206 1410868 I didn't know
he was still here.
1413211 1415543 Hold it right there, mister!

1416882 1420443 - Wait. You have the wrong man.
- Stand aside, will you please?

1420552 1424113 - I didn't kill anyone.
- Right now what you are is a suspect.

1424222 1427453 Turn yourself in. I'll listen
to whatever you have to say.
1427559 1429550 You're not gonna believe.

1430562 1433554 - Try me.
- There's someone after me.

1434232 1437224 There's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1437569 1440163 And I don't even know...
they're not even...

1440839 1444502 - Who's gonna listen to a madman?
- Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
1449848 1452180 No one ever listens to me.
1458190 1460181 Murdoch, stop!

1501833 1504825 - How much further?
- We're almost there, buddy.

1506838 1511172 - You know the way to Shell Beach?
- You're kidding.
1511510 1513501 We spent our honeymoon there.
1513845 1516177 You just take main street west to...
1518517 1520508 or is it the cross...
1520852 1522513 you know, that's funny.

1522854 1526187 I can't seem to remember if it's main
street west or the cross-town.

1530862 1533854 I'm sorry, inspector, I cannot be
of more assistance...

1534199 1538533 - But I am running late.
- I appreciate your taking the time.
1546878 1549210 Just one thing puzzles me.

1549548 1553780 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1553885 1556786 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1556888 1560051 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1560158 1563491 - I know when someone is lying to me.
- Inspector...

1563828 1566820 judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1567165 1570157 - Maybe you could give me a few pointers.
- Certainly.
1570835 1572826 Let's take you, for instance.

1573171 1576163 You are a fastidious man,
driven...
1576508 1578738 consumed by details.
1578843 1580743 I would say your life...

1580845 1584838 is rather lonely. Good evening,
inspector. I really must be going.

1628493 1630825 - How is he?
- The same.

1631830 1634822 Walenski.
It's me, Frank.
1640505 1642166 Come in, Frank.
1645176 1647167 Close the door.

1654519 1659513 I've been looking through your
old reports. Interesting case.

1661192 1664525 The kind that can make
a man's career...

1667866 1671199 - I was on that case.
- And then what?

1672203 1675195 - What happened then?
- Nothing happened, Frank.

1676207 1680041 I've just been spending time
on the subway riding in circles.
1680145 1682477 Thinking in circles.
1682814 1684475 There's no way out.

1685817 1688479 I've been over every
inch of this city.

1692157 1695820 - You're scaring your wife to death.
- She's not my wife.

1697162 1700063 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.

1700165 1704158 - What makes you say that?
- Do you think about the past much?
1705837 1707498 As much as the next guy.

1708173 1710733 See, I've been trying
to remember things...
1710842 1713504 from my past.

1714179 1718843 But the more I try to think back
the more it all starts to unravel.

1719184 1721516 None of it seems real.
It's like...

1721853 1724754 I've just been
dreaming this life...

1724856 1727757 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.

1727859 1730521 Somebody
totally different.

1734532 1740129 You saw something, didn't you, Eddie?
Something to do with the case.

1740805 1743797 There is no case.
There never was!

1744142 1748806 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!

1789187 1792850 Tonight's requirements
are 12 family photo albums...

1793525 1797859 9 personal diaries...
17 love letters...
1798196 1801188 assorted childhood photographs...
1805203 1807194 These do bring back memories.
1809874 1812206 This one is still warm.

1812877 1817211 What is it? The recollections
of a great lover?

1817549 1821542 A catalog of conquests?
You'll soon find out.

1823221 1827783 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. whatever your name is.

1827892 1831885 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
1835900 1838232 A touch of unhappy childhood.

1843908 1846570 A dash of teenage
rebellion.
1848246 1849907 And last, but not least...

1850915 1854578 - A tragic death in the family.
- Doctor.

1865196 1868859 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the tuning as the others do?

1869200 1873432 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

1873538 1876200 A freak of nature.
He's adapted to survive.

1876541 1881205 Weren't you looking for the human soul?
That's the purpose of your little zoo.

1882213 1885444 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

1885550 1888212 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...
1888553 1889884 and it's going to bite you on your...

1893558 1897460 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

1897562 1901123 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune...

1901232 1905225 is absurd, I know, but what other
explanation is there?
1956888 1957877 Shut it down.

1977241 1980176 Frederickson says he'll take me
off the damn night shift soon.
1980511 1982843 Well, it's about time, dear.
2057855 2060847 Can anybody hear me?!
2063528 2066190 Let the tuning commence.

2226157 2229149 The Goodwins.
Jeremy, Sylvia...
2229827 2232159 Jane and little Matthew.
2235499 2238161 Jane and little Matthew.
2267865 2269856 The rich get richer.

2270201 2274194 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.

2327191 2329421 Dr. Schreber,
I presume.

2329527 2331518 - It's you.
- Hey, come on.

2332196 2335757 That's no way to greet a patient, doc.
If that's what you are, huh, doctor?

2335866 2338426 - Mr. Murdoch, please...
- What is happening here?

2338536 2341471 - Why is everyone asleep?
- Keep your voice down.

2341806 2343797 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2344141 2347804 Nothing. please, I want to help you.
We can't talk here.

2348145 2350477 - It's not safe. If they see us...
- I don't care.

2350815 2353807 I want some answers now!
Who are they?
2354151 2356051 Why are they trying to kill me?
2362159 2365151 My God. You really can do it.

2365496 2369057 - I did that?
- You have their power.

2369166 2372499 You can make things happen by will
alone. They call it tuning.
2372837 2374828 That's how they make the changes.

2375172 2377072 Just now you acted out of
self defense. A reflex.

2377174 2380166 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2380511 2384174 Let me help you. Together we can
stop them. We can take the city back.
2390521 2392853 My glasses, please.

2443574 2445906 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...
2446243 2448575 lollygagging around as he did.

2448913 2451814 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2451916 2453907 And well you should have, darling.

2454585 2457577 He attacked me.
I don't know where he has gone.

2458255 2463192 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do. Yes?

2467198 2472534 They say that you're
A run-around lover
2474538 2477530 Though you say

2485216 2490552 But if you put me down
For another

2493891 2497884 I'll know
Believe me

2501565 2504898 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2505236 2508467 The first subject
shall be imprinted here...

2508572 2511905 - On avenue M.
- Mr. Book, there is a problem.

2512576 2515477 - There is no avenue M.
- We were unable to complete it.

2515579 2518912 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2519250 2522185 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2522520 2526513 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.

2526857 2528848 He's becoming
like us.

2529193 2532754 So we must become
like him.

2532863 2535093 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2535199 2539863 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume 2.

2541205 2546871 We must not do this. Murdoch does not
possess these memories, yes?

2547211 2550203 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2550548 2554780 Everywhere he goes, everyone he seeks
out will be known to us.

2554885 2557217 And as he follows
the clues...
2557555 2559887 so shall we follow the memories.

2560224 2562784 But to imprint
one of us.
2562893 2565123 Failure has always resulted.

2565229 2568892 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2575906 2578238 This may sting a bit.

2618215 2621548 I have John Murdoch...
in mind.

2624555 2627888 I found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2628225 2631558 Brings back memories,
doesn't it? Stop by sometime.

2631895 2635456 We'll see if we can't hook
ourselves another mermaid.

2635566 2638228 love to Emma.
Karl."
2646510 2648171 Karl Harris.

2665863 2668525 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
2668866 2670857 Try the subway.

2673871 2677864 - You got a problem, pal?
- You been working here long?

2678208 2682542 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.
2706503 2708835 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2743874 2747867 - She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
- A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

2748212 2750544 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

2750881 2753111 but instead we have
been brought here.

2753217 2757119 - This is irrational.
- Instincts are irrational.
2757221 2760156 And we must follow where they lead.

2760491 2764052 Mr. Sleep suggests he
may go to places familiar...

2764161 2767062 - His job.
- He does not care about our job.

2767164 2769826 Indulge us,
Mr. Hand.
2770167 2771828 If you were Murdoch...
2772169 2776162 If... I were Murdoch...
2777841 2779502 I would remember...

2779843 2783836 how my wife had hurt me
by sleeping with another man.

2788519 2792512 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.
2795192 2797854 Leave me alone with her.
2798195 2800186 There's work to be done.
2803200 2805862 All change, platform 3.

2806203 2808865 - Platform 3, all change.
- All change?

2809206 2811197 Excuse me. How do I get
to the end of the line?
2811542 2813203 You want the express.

2826490 2829482 - How come that train didn't stop?
- That's the express.
2830828 2832819 There's no way out, you know?

2833163 2836155 You can't get out of the city.
Believe me, I've tried.

2836500 2840163 You're Murdoch, aren't you?
The one they've been looking for.
2840504 2842062 You're not a killer.

2842172 2846074 They set you up with a fake identity,
like everyone else in this place.

2846176 2848508 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.

2848846 2853510 At least, in this life, I was.
They steal people's memories, you know?

2854184 2858518 Then they swap them around between us.
I've seen them do it...
2858856 2861188 till no one knows who they are anymore.

2861525 2864085 - How do you know all this?
- Once in a while, one of us wakes up...
2864194 2866526 while they're changing things.

2866864 2870527 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does. It happened to me.
2871535 2873867 They'll come looking for you.
2874204 2876536 Just like they'll come looking for me.

2876874 2880139 But that's OK.
I figured a way out.
2890487 2892478 They were here.

2893490 2897824 - Last night.
- This was to be his home.

2900163 2903826 - That was when we loved her.
- This is all well and good...

2904167 2908831 but we require a more practical link
to his present whereabouts.
2911174 2915167 And I know where to find her.

2923854 2927847 - We're lucky, if you think about it.
- I'm sorry?

2928191 2932525 To be able to revisit those places
which have meant so very much to us.

2932863 2935423 I thought it was more
that we were haunted by them.

2937200 2941136 There used to be a ferry when I was a
boy, biggest thing you ever saw.

2941805 2945468 Lit up like a floating
birthday cake.

2946143 2950477 That's just what my husband
once said to me on this very spot.

2951815 2955478 - Where is your husband now?
- I wish I knew.

2956153 2960487 - What brings you here?
- I met my wife at this place.

2960824 2964817 - It's where I first met my husband.
- Small world.

3066863 3070526 - What are you doing here?
- I've been following you.
3074204 3075865 Hold it right there!

3082546 3086539 I thought you'd forgotten
your uncle Karl.
3086883 3089215 You son of a gun!

3110574 3113566 - Shell Beach is where I grew up?
- That's what I said.

3113910 3118574 - Shell Beach, your hometown.
- How do I get there?

3119916 3122851 I don't know.
I haven't been there in years.

3123186 3125848 You must remember.
You gotta have some idea.

3126189 3129181 - Come on!
- Sorry, Johnny.

3130193 3133526 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3136867 3140530 - So bright there.
- Brighter times, I guess.

3142205 3145197 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3145542 3147442 That's me and your pa.
3147544 3149444 What a couple of handsome fools.
3149546 3151537 What happened to my parents?
3153216 3155207 Where are they now?

3155886 3160220 They're dead. They died when

3160557 3164891 I looked after you.

3169566 3171227 What is that?
3175906 3177464 What's the scar?

3177574 3180509 You burnt your arm
pretty bad in the fire.

3185515 3189508 - What does it mean?
- It means these are all lies!

3193523 3195753 My husband told me
he'd been here.
3195859 3198521 He told me he wanted to test himself...

3198862 3201854 See if he was...
capable of...

3212542 3216535 I wanted to talk to her.

3218215 3221207 Stay here. I'm gonna
call the station.
3236233 3237894 It's beautiful.

3239903 3244840 It was a gift from my mother.

3245842 3248504 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.

3254851 3260517 It's a funny thing, though. I can't

3261858 3265521 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?

3266196 3270860 - What's happening, inspector?
- I'm not sure I know anymore.

3274204 3279198 I left your old room like it was.

3279542 3283205 Glad to have you back, Johnny...
even if it is for just a night.

3285215 3287206 - Is that the right time?
- Why, sure.

3287884 3291877 - That clock's kept perfect time.
- A.m. or p.m.?

3293223 3295783 - What do you think, Johnny?

3295892 3298554 How can it be night already?

3298895 3301489 You're tired.
Anything's possible.

3302832 3307166 Get some sleep. We'll straighten
all this out tomorrow.

3332862 3336195 "Guide to Shell Beach
by Johnny Murdoch."

3359222 3361713 - Hello.

3361825 3364157 - He's acting mighty peculiar.

3364494 3368157 He's not himself. Keep him there,

3368498 3370830 - I'll try.

3373837 3377500 I can't promise anything.

3377841 3380833 Johnny... we just wanted to help.
3387517 3390850 Karl. Uncle Karl.

3391187 3395180 If you're in some kind of trouble

3396192 3398854 Haven't seen you in so long.

3472869 3477533 Mr. Murdoch, you've been
the cause of much distress.

3482145 3484807 - Start talking.
- There's no need for this.

3485148 3488140 There's no escape. The city's ours.

3488485 3490043 What are you talking about?

3490153 3493054 We fashioned this city

3493156 3496717 different eras, different

3496826 3500819 Each night, we revise it, refine it

3501164 3503155 - Learn what?
- About you...
3503833 3506165 you and your fellow inhabitants...

3506503 3509495 - What makes you human.

3509839 3512501 We need to be like you.

3512842 3517404 I understand you now. I remember

3517514 3520847 what you've been missing.
The ocean, yes...

3521518 3523850 running along the waves
as a child...

3524187 3528521 meeting Emma at the river,
that first kiss that followed.

3529859 3532851 - What are you?
- You've seen what we are.

3533196 3535858 We use your dead
as vessels.

3681544 3685446 - What about her? Ring any bells?
- She was alive when I left her.

3685548 3687880 - What about this?
- This is nothing. I...

3688217 3691880 it must mean something,
all those pictures.

3693890 3695881 - I don't understand this.
- Stop playing games with me!

3696225 3698785 - Stop telling me lies!
- I am not telling you lies!

3698895 3703127 Help me out here. Make me understand.
I have this jigsaw puzzle...

3703232 3706224 and every time I try to rearrange
the pieces it doesn't make any sense.

3706569 3709902 You think it makes sense to me?
I'm in the dark here.
3710239 3711900 You let me ask you a question?

3712241 3714141 You heard of a place called
Shell Beach?
3714243 3715904 Know how to get there?

3716579 3718570 - Can you tell me?
- Right.

3722518 3725180 - Where do you go?
- Just give me a second.

3726522 3730856 You can't remember, can you?
You think that's kind of odd?
3733196 3735187 I got a better one for you.

3735531 3739524 When was the last time you remember
doing something during the day?

3739869 3742861 - What do you mean?
- I just mean... during the day.

3744207 3747108 Daylight. When was the last time

3747210 3750873 And I'm not talking about some

3751214 3753876 I mean like yesterday?
Last week? When?
3754217 3756549 Can you come up with a single memory?

3757887 3761220 You can't, can you?
I don't think the sun even...
3762225 3765217 exists... in this place.

3765561 3768121 'Cause I've been up for
hours and hours...

3768231 3771223 - And the night never ends here.
- That is crazy.

3771567 3773899 You're damn right
this is crazy.

3774237 3777229 It's not just me.
It's all of us.

3777573 3780838 - They're doing something to all of us.
- Shut up. I've heard enough.

3781177 3783168 - Please listen.
- Shut up!

3794190 3797853 There has to be an explanation
of this somewhere.
3804534 3806866 Explain this.

3826222 3830886 John, I'm so sorry.
I never meant to hurt you.

3831227 3833889 I don't know why I did it.
I wish I could take it all back.
3834230 3837563 No. Emma, you didn't do it.

3837900 3839891 This affair of yours, the thing you're
supposed to have done...

3840169 3844162 - You didn't do it.

3844841 3846502 I know this is gonna sound crazy...

3847176 3850407 but what if we never
knew each other before now?

3850513 3854415 What if the first time
we ever met was last night...

3854517 3856849 in your...
in our apartment...

3857186 3862522 and everything that I'm supposed
to remember never really happened.

3862859 3865521 Someone just wants us
to think it did.
3866195 3868425 But how can that be true?

3868531 3871523 I so vividly
remember meeting you.

3872535 3875527 I remember falling
in love with you.
3876539 3878871 I remember losing you.

3882879 3886212 Please...
just one more minute.
3892221 3894553 I love you, John.

3897560 3901826 You can't fake
something like that.
3931861 3934193 Inspector? Sir?

3935531 3938523 Detective Walenski
killed himself last night.
3940536 3942868 I kind of thought you should know.
3944874 3947536 The chief wanted to see you.

3956218 3958880 I knew you'd track
the killer down, sir.

3988184 3991517 - How can we help you, sir?
- You can sleep.

4013876 4017869 I want to be the first to
congratulate you about the case.

4020149 4023812 - Take us to Murdoch.
- Sleep.

4051514 4055746 - Dr. Schreber.
- I knew you'd come eventually.

4055851 4058513 Don't you think it's about time
you started giving me some answers?
4059522 4062514 Yes. Won't you please sit down?

4065528 4070192 I come here often. It's one of the few
places I'm allowed a moment's peace.

4070533 4073866 You see, they have
an aversion to... water.
4074870 4076861 One could almost call it a phobia.

4077206 4079868 Who are they?
What do they want from me?

4081811 4085804 For now, let's just say that you were
the subject of their experiment.

4089485 4091476 I'm sorry about this.
I truly am.

4091821 4095484 But we don't have much time and I can't
afford doing this the right way.

4095825 4099158 Everything you need to know, all the
answers, are in this syringe.

4099495 4103158 I need you to inject yourself. It's the
only way to make you understand.

4103499 4106059 - You're kidding me, right?
- We're running out of time.

4106168 4109831 - You have to do this now.
- Give me the gun, doctor.

4110172 4112163 Inspector, he is more
disturbed than we thought.

4112508 4115068 I may not be the judge
of personality...

4115177 4117839 but you're the one
who looks disturbed to me.
4118848 4121180 You do not know what you are doing.

4121851 4125514 What, exactly
is in this, doctor?

4127189 4130522 All the answers you've been
looking for, I swear to you.

4132528 4138194 Guess I'll just have to hold onto
it for safekeeping...
4138534 4140468 Let's go, doctor.
4141137 4144470 Go? Where are we going?
4144807 4146798 Shell Beach.
4147810 4149801 That's where you want to go, isn't it?

4159822 4162814 You won't find anything there.
I've been there, and...

4163159 4165491 If you've been there you can show
us the way, can't you?

4165828 4169161 I won't. I refuse.
You can't make me go there!

4169498 4172160 Don't you understand?
They'll be waiting for us.

4180843 4184176 I don't understand.
Used to be a bridge here.

4191187 4194179 Try that again, your friends are gonna
be fishing you out of the canal.

4194523 4197185 Just don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.
4208871 4210862 Who are you people?
4211207 4214199 Let's go. End of the canal.

4215211 4219545 We will give you some more pretty
things soon... Anna.
4223219 4225210 You will be soon, yes.

4229558 4231890 I have another use
for her first.
4241237 4243467 I call them... the Strangers.

4243572 4246234 They abducted us
and brought us here.
4247243 4249234 The city, everyone in it...

4250246 4253238 is their experiment.
They mix and match our memories...

4253582 4257245 as they see fit, trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4257586 4260180 One day, a man
might be an inspector.

4260522 4263514 The next, someone
entirely different.

4263859 4265520 When they want
to study a murder...

4266862 4270855 they simply imprint one of their
citizens with a new personality...

4271533 4275526 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...

4276205 4280198 even a lost wallet.
Then they observe the results.

4281210 4285544 Will a man, given the history of
a killer continue in that vein?

4285881 4289783 Or are we, in fact more than
the mere sum of our memories?

4289885 4294219 This business of you being
a killer was an unhappy coincidence.

4294890 4297222 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4297559 4301222 You just happened to wake up
while I was imprinting you...
4301897 4303888 Why are they doing all of this?

4304233 4307896 It is our capacity for
individuality, our souls...

4308237 4311570 that makes us different from them.
They think they can find...

4311907 4315240 the human soul if they understand
how our memories work.

4315577 4319240 All they have are collective memories.
They share one group mind.

4319915 4324181 They're dying. Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4324853 4326753 They think we can save them.

4326855 4329517 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4329858 4332850 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4337533 4340764 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.

4340869 4344100 That is how they change things.
That is how they built this city.

4344206 4347107 They have machines very deep
beneath the surface...

4347209 4351202 that allow them to focus their
telepathic energies.

4351547 4353879 They control everything here...
even the sun.

4354216 4357208 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.

4357553 4360545 - So why do they need you?
- When they first brought us here...

4360889 4364882 they extracted what was in us.
So they could store the information...

4365227 4369561 remix it like so much paint
and give us back new memories.

4369898 4373891 But they still needed
an artist to help them.

4375237 4378229 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind...
4378574 4380735 better than they ever could...

4380843 4384176 so they allowed me to keep
my skills as a scientist.

4384513 4387505 But they made me
delete everything else.

4395858 4400192 Can you imagine what it is like
being forced to erase your own past?

4400529 4403191 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
4404199 4406861 Shell Beach, uncle Karl.
4407536 4409197 What about this?

4410205 4413868 - This was blank when I found it!
- You still don't understand.

4414209 4417110 You were never a boy...
not in this place.

4417212 4421876 Your entire history is an illusion
as it is with all of us.

4422217 4424777 You made those drawings happen
with your gift.

4424887 4426878 You say they brought
us here.

4435230 4439223 I don't remember.
None of us remember that...

4439902 4442837 what we once were...
what we might have been...
4443839 4445830 somewhere else.

4462858 4466191 I've taken you this far.
You don't need me anymore.
4513175 4515837 There is no ocean, John.
4516512 4519174 There is nothing beyond the city.
4520516 4522507 The only "home" exists...
4525187 4527178 in your head.

4574169 4576831 And now you
know the truth.

4635831 4640495 Surrender, or it will result in
this one's death, yes?

4640836 4643828 What do I care?
She's not my real wife!

4644172 4647505 - She's nothing to me!
- But you do still care...
4647843 4649504 don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

4649845 4653838 I have become the monster
you were intended to be.

4655517 4659180 Shall I end her life now
as you would have?

4662524 4664424 Don't hurt her,
please!

4664526 4667859 Then surrender,
Mr. Murdoch.
4716845 4718506 He is powerful, yes.

4719181 4723174 Dangerous. But he can also
lead us to what we seek.

4723518 4726851 What the doctor
calls the soul.

4727189 4730522 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

4730859 4733191 We no longer need
the other subjects.
4733528 4736190 The time for study is over.

4737199 4741465 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.
4748477 4751469 It is time, doctor. Imprint.
4754483 4756144 Shut it down!
4757486 4760148 Shut it down forever!

4774169 4777502 - What are you doing?
- They want to imprint you...

4778173 4780835 with their own
collective memories.

4781843 4783834 They want to make you
one of them...

4784179 4788172 so they can share your soul.
But I've got other plans.

4792187 4794849 Imprint, doctor.
No more disobedience.

4795190 4799524 I'm sorry, John. The pain will
only last a moment or two.
4810872 4812863 Remember, John.

4813875 4817868 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

4821883 4824545 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

4824886 4827787 Remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.
4827889 4829550 John, remember.

4830225 4832557 You're wondering why I keep
appearing in your memories.
4832894 4834885 I have inserted myself in them.

4835230 4839132 Only these memories have been fabricated
to teach you about the strangers.

4839234 4842226 Give you a lifetime of
knowledge in a single syringe.
4845240 4846901 You will survive, John.

4847909 4851572 You will find strength within
yourself and you will prevail.
4854249 4855910 Hi, uncle Karl.

4859588 4863854 You're getting the hang of it. Maybe
one day I'll be working for you.

4864192 4867855 This is the machine the strangers
use to amplify their thoughts.
4868196 4869754 The machine that changes their world.

4869865 4872857 You must take control of it.
You must make the machine yours.
4873201 4874862 I know you can beat them, John.
4875203 4877535 But you must concentrate.
4879541 4881532 Something's wrong.
4889217 4891447 There is no time for romance, John.

4891553 4893885 The world can be
what you make it.
4894222 4895883 What have you done?

4896224 4900558 You have the power to make
anything happen but you must act now!

5184846 5188509 I knew you could do it, John.
You have their power now.

5188850 5191182 - You control their machines.
- Where's Emma?

5192520 5196513 She is not Emma anymore, John.

5196858 5199190 - So give her back her memories.
- I can't.

5199527 5203190 The facility where the strangers
stored the memories has been destroyed.
5206534 5208195 What are you going to do now, John?
5211539 5213200 I'm gonna fix things.

5214542 5217534 You told me I had
the power, didn't you?

5218880 5221474 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5222817 5224808 Make this world anything
I want it to be.

5226154 5229817 Just as long as I
concentrate hard enough.
5314175 5315836 Where are you going?
5318513 5320174 Shell Beach.

5361155 5363146 - What's the fare?
- Quarter.

5369497 5371829 Oh, please.
I stand aside.

5419213 5422876 been waiting for you, yes?
What are you doing?

5423217 5426118 I'm just making a few little
changes around here is all.

5426220 5430884 - Are we sure that's what we want?
- I'm prepared to take my chances.

5433227 5436560 Your imprint is not
agreeable with my kind.

5436898 5439230 But I wanted to know

5440902 5445236 - How you feel.
- You know how I was supposed to feel.

5445573 5448906 That person isn't me.

5449577 5452569 You wanted to know what it was

5453915 5457248 You're not going to find it... in here.
5459587 5462181 You went looking in the wrong place.
5560555 5562216 It's so beautiful here.

5575236 5580503 - Shell Beach is around here?
- I think that's it over there.
5598859 5600850 I'm headed that way myself.
5602863 5604524 Would you like to join me?
5613874 5615535 I'm Anna, by the way.

5616210 5618542 - What's your name?

5620881 5622872 John Murdoch.
